scripts.pgdb: sudo docker run --name postgres -d -p 5432:5432 -e POSTGRES_USER=ui_test -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=ui_test -e POSTGRES_DB=ui_test postgres:14.4
scripts.init-table: sudo docker exec -it postgres psql -U ui_test -c 'CREATE TABLE users ( acct varchar(128), pwd varchar(128), fullname varchar(128), created_at timestamp, updated_at timestamp, PRIMARY KEY (acct));'
